Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A gene encoding a novel transmembrane protein was identified by DNA sequence analysis within the insulin - dependent diabetes mellitus ( IDDM ) locus IDDM4 on chromosome 11q13 .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus (IDDM) |

Explanation:

The disease entity in the given paragraph is "insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus (IDDM)". It is a type of diabetes that is dependent on insulin injections for survival. The acronym IDDM stands for the same disease. The full form is used in the paragraph, so we can identify it as a disease entity.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus (IDDM) |

Explanation:

The only disease entity in the given paragraph is "insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus (IDDM)". The term "IDDM locus IDDM4" refers to a specific genetic locus associated with the disease and not the disease itself, so it is not included in the table. Similarly, "chromosome 11q13" is a genetic location and not a disease, so it is not included in the table.
